waveform.description: A list representing an audio waveform.

sample_rate.description: The sample rate of the audio waveform.

language.description: The language of the audio content.

input.description: A list of objects representing audio inputs.

service_name.description: The name of the transcription service.

model_checkpoint.description: The specific model checkpoint to use for transcription.

batch_size.description: The number of audio samples to process in one batch.

chunk_length_s.description: The length of each audio chunk in seconds.

max_new_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

anyOf.description: Whether to return timestamps with the transcription as a boolean.
Specifies the detail level of timestamps returned with the transcription.

return_timestamps.description: Can be a boolean to simply enable/disable timestamps, or a string to specify the detail level of timestamps with the transcription.
